channel.title: Kristjan's webiste
channel.description: This is my personal website. I'll be writting my thoughts, projects, articles, ideas...

item.title: Hello world!
item.description:
Hello World

Today is 8th of January 2019 and finally I got myself to start creating my personal website.
I am not exactly sure what I’ll be posting here, probably my thoughts, things that I find interesting, my personal projects and problems that I solve in my day to day life…

My main goal is to document my life, get better at writting English and inspire/help people that somehow land on my website.

Have a nice day
